alert.note: Alert for Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:10PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mariposa, southeastern Tuolumne and northeastern Madera Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 309 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tioga Pass, or 11 miles west of June Lake, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tioga Pass, Vogelsang High Sierra Camp, Tuolumne High Sierra Camp, Tuolumne Meadows, Dana Meadows, Tuolumne Meadows Visitor Center and Tuolumne Meadows Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Yosemite NP outside of the valley
